word_mean: 〔USP〕安息香：为芳香树脂，得自安息香树(苏门答腊安息香)或越南安息香(泰国安息香)
前者为红棕、红灰或灰棕色块，后者为黄棕至赤褐色块。用作局部保护剂和抗菌剂，刺激性祛痰剂和呼吸道炎症的吸入剂苯甲酰苯基甲醇：一种白色结晶化合物，C14H12O2，由苯甲醛在氰化钾溶液中缩合制成

sentence.Network_en: Paint one side of washer with benzoin and apply this side to skin.
sentence.Network_cn: 将洗涤器的一面涂上安息香并将它贴到皮肤上.

sentence.Network_en: Other fixatives which may be used include the oleoresins such as benzoin, or styrax.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他可用的固定剂有苯偶姻或安息香等含油树脂.

sentence.Network_en: Like amber and incense, musk, benzoin.
sentence.Network_cn: 仿佛龙涎香 、 麝香 、 安息香和乳香.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French benjoin, based on Arabic lubānjāwī 'incense of Java'

means.word_mean: 1. gum resin used especially in treating skin irritation
